title: People are upset about the Corrupted Star Guardian Skins
body:
I'm upset that this is gonna turn into a cash grab where Riot makes everyone pay an extra $5 per skin to get a non-corrupted skin variant of them.

EDIT: And they're for sure gonna shit out another Prestige Skin for this event.
EDIT 2: I'd like to think Riot could release non-corrupted skin variants as rewards for finishing missions, but I don't have enough faith in Riot.
EDIT 3: There's always the chance that in 2019 Riot simply lacks the creativity to even think to make non-corrupted skin variants of these skins.
